content: Anyone aware of work to port Field Collection module from D7? How does it relate to multifield (if at all)?

Early chatter about a migration path from FC to Paragraphs: https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/paragraphs/issues/53

Upgrade from Drupal 7 field collection into paragraphs 路 Issue #53 路 backdrop-contrib/paragraphs
I'm interested in working on an upgrade path from Drupal 7 field collection. Is anyone else working on this, and if so, can we collaborate or would others be willing to help me test?
Hmm...I feel like those aren't the same thing. :) But I'll read...
From my experience, multifield is a much better solution for the things that I used to use field collection for.
I do agree that they serve a very different purpose to Paragraphs.
I just posted (really poorly) on that issue. Its one of those conceptual differences that's hard to explain even if you use both extensively. :)
@Joseph Flatt Did you do a migration at all from Field Collection to Multifield? Or did you just start from scratch...
(also weird...that issue I just replied to was from almost exactly a year ago (tomorrow))

Currently, I only get paid to work on D7, so I have not had to migrate anything yet. I have used field collection on D7 and multifield on some personal Backdrop sites that I use to keep track of stuff and it just seems like a much better and cleaner experience.
I haven't used FC so don't have an opinion on it. :smile:
I've found a few places where it's pretty essential to build out custom stuff. I've used it alot so I could just manually build something rather than using a contrib module.
